note: Priya Dogra is a prominent nutritionist, renowned for her transformative weight loss journey. Weighing 100 kg at the start of her ketogenic lifestyle in 2015, she successfully shed 40 kg, reaching 62 kg within a year. Her personal experience inspired her to help others adopt healthier lifestyles through the ketogenic diet. Featured in major publications like India Today and Times of India, Priya is dedicated to empowering individuals to embrace fitness and well-being.
